commandList.name: quit
commandList.description: quit execution of command handling, this command quits immediately without saving the model

commandList.name: back
commandList.description: go back one level in editor context hierarchy

commandList.name: help
commandList.description: output help information appropriate to this point in the editor context hierarchy

commandList.name: load

argumentList.description: Name of a file containing an Apex model in JSON or XML format

commandList.description: Load an Apex model from a file

commandList.name: save

argumentList.description: Name of the file to save the model to
Flag indicating that the model should be saved in XML format, model saved in JSON format if flag is false or is not specified

commandList.description: Save an Apex model to a file

commandList.name: analyse
commandList.description: Analyse an Apex model to show concept usage

commandList.name: validate
commandList.description: Validate the entire Apex model to ensure it is consistent

commandList.name: compare

argumentList.description: The file name of the other model
Flag indicating that only differences between the model are returned when set
Flag indicating that only keys are printed when set, more terse output

commandList.description: Compare an Apex model with another Apex model

commandList.name: split

argumentList.description: the file name of the target model in which to store the model split out from the original model
the policies form the original model to include in the split out model, specified as a comma delimited list of policy names

commandList.description: Split an Apex model into a separate Apex model with only the specified policies

commandList.name: merge

argumentList.description: the file name of the model to merge into the current model
if true, if a concept exists in both models, the original model copy of that concept is kept, if false, the mreged model overwrites

commandList.description: Merge another Apex model into this model

argumentList.description: name of the model
version of the model, omit to use the default version
model UUID, omit to generate a UUID
model description, omit to generate a description

commandList.name: listModel
commandList.description: List an Apex model, list all the concepts in the model

commandList.name: deleteModel
commandList.description: Delete an Apex model, clear all the concepts in the model
